skill.name: Heal
skill.description: Heals an ally or himself based on intelligence

skill.name: Light Strike
skill.description: Hits enemy with a magic attack based on intelligence

skill.name: Mace Throw
skill.description: Throws mace at an enemy dealing damage based on strength. If target is burning reduces the enemy physical debense by 50%, magical defense by 25% and strength by 25% for 2 turns

skill.name: Heal +
skill.description: Strengthens Heal healing even more

skill.name: Light Strike +
skill.description: Empowers Light Strike to reduce the magic defense of the enemy by 25% for 2 turns

skill.name: Mace Throw +
skill.description: Strengthens Mace Throw deal extra damage and increasing the debuffs turns by 3

skill.name: Blessing
skill.description: Blessing that heals a lot of health to an ally

skill.name: Harden Skin
skill.description: Hardens skin as tough as stone to gain a 50% boost to physical defense, intelligence and strength

skill.name: Clarity
skill.description: Purifies a party member removing all its debuffs

skill.name: Kick
skill.description: Physical attack that deals reduced damage based on strength and has a chance to stun the enemy for 2 turns

skill.name: Guard
skill.description: Protects himself or an ally for 1 turn increasing their physical and magical defenses by 25%

skill.name: Heavy Slash
skill.description: Deals physical damage based on strength that also 50% chance of causing bleed for 3 turns

skill.name: Kick +
skill.description: Strengthens Kick attack augmenting the stun chance and lowering enemy physical defense by 25%

skill.name: Guard +
skill.description: Strengthens Guard increasing the defenses by 50%

skill.name: Heavy Slash +
skill.description: Strenghtens Heavy Slash attack augmenting the damage dealt, 50% chance of bleeding and lowering the enemy physical defense by 25%

skill.name: Charge
skill.description: Charges through an enemy dealing physical damage based on strength that reduces the judgement of the enemy by 50% for 2 turns

skill.name: Taunt
skill.description: Angers an enemy, reducing its defenses by 50% but increasing the strength by 25%

skill.name: Whirlwind
skill.description: Sword spining attack that deals damage to an enemy based on strength

skill.name: H. Axe
skill.description: Attacks with multiple axe swings that deal physical damage based on strength and deal extra damage to stunned enemies. Reduces enemy defenses by 25% for 1 turn

skill.name: Morale Boost
skill.description: 25% boost to strength and intelligence for 2 turns on an ally

skill.name: Dwarfs Wrath
skill.description: Boosts dexterity by 50% for 2 turns

skill.name: High Axe +
skill.description: Strengthens Double Edged Axe dealing more damage

skill.name: Morale Boost +
skill.description: Strengthens Morale Boost making it last for 3 turns and boosting strength by 50%

skill.name: Dwarfs Wrath +
skill.description: Strengthens Dwarfs Wrath lasting 3 turns

skill.name: Raging Mock
skill.description: Anger enemy decreasing its judgement, strength and intelligence by 50% for 3 turns

skill.name: Meteor
skill.description: Throws enormous rock to an enemy that deals big physical damage based on strength. If enemy is stunned, deals extra damage

skill.name: Counter
skill.description: Increases defenses and strength by 50% for 3 turns

skill.name: Blizzard
skill.description: Calls forth a strong blizzard that deals damage based on intelligence and lowers the enemy agility by 50%

skill.name: Seed Of Life
skill.description: Casts 2 magic life balls that heal an ally based on intelligence

skill.name: Fireball
skill.description: Big fire spell that hits an enemy with damage based on intelligence and has a chance to burn them for 2 turns. If enemy stunned, deals extra damage

skill.name: Lightning Bolt
skill.description: Strikes an enemy with an electrical attack based on intelligence that has a chance to stun them

skill.name: Seed Of Life +
skill.description: Empowers Seeds of Life to increase healing

skill.name: Fireball +
skill.description: Empowers Fireball to deal greater damage and have a higher chance to burn enemies

skill.name: Lightning Bolt +
skill.description: Strenghtens Lightning Bolt to deal higher damage and increase the chance to stun

skill.name: Revive
skill.description: Casts a powerfull spell to bring back from the dead an ally with a small amount of health that increases based on intelligence

skill.name: Fire Djinn
skill.description: Summons the Fire Djiin to deal heavy damage based on intelligence
